name: inex3
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wo(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cin(c0, c2), universe))

stmt.origin: jaoi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cin(c0, c2), universe))
stmt.pretty: jaoi(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, (c0 ⋂ c2)∈ 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wi(wo(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cin(c0, c2), universe))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cin(c0, c2), universe))
-| wi(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cin(c0, c2), universe))
